title: My girlfriend is self-conscious about her being fat, when she’s actually super skinny. What do I do to help her feel better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google Anorexia Nervosia — symptoms, treatment, medical. Discuss it with her and try to get her to an eating disorder specialist. Eating disorders often result from sexual abuse in childhood.
Tell her she's beautiful, every day. Point out what makes her beautiful ex. her eyes, her hair. Write her a cute poem if that's your thing. Be sweet.
